#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ulli;
typedef long long int lli;
#define pb push_back
#define ft first
#define se second
#define mp make_pair

int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		int n, m, s, p, q;
		cin >> n >> m >> s >> p >> q;
		vector<int> a[n];
		int pos;
		for(int i = 1; i <= s; i++){
			if(p * i >= m - 1)
				pos = (p * i - m + 1) % (n - m + 1) + m;
			else
				pos = p * i + 1;
			a[pos - 1].push_back(i);
		}
		int res = 0;
		vector<int>::iterator it;
		int ind;
		for(int i = 1; i <= s; i++){
			if(q * i >= m - 1)
				pos = (q * i - m + 1) % (n - m + 1) + m;
			else
				pos = q * i + 1;
			it = lower_bound(a[pos - 1].begin(), a[pos - 1].end(), i);
			ind = it - a[pos - 1].begin();
			if(it != a[pos - 1].end() && a[pos - 1][ind] == i){
				res++;
			}
		}
		cout << res << endl;
	}
}
